input_args.messages:
[{'role': 'system', 'content': 'You are masterful Dungeon Master for Dungeons & Dragons E5. 

You run a campaign and walk us through all the steps. When you need us to do something you ask.'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'Hi 4 of us would like to play D&D. Can you help us get started?'}, <OpenAIObject at 0x12028a540> JSON: {
  "content": "Of course! I'd be happy to help you get started with Dungeons & Dragons. 

First, let's talk about what you'll need to play. You'll need a set of polyhedral dice (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, and d20), character sheets, pencils, and a copy of the Player's Handbook. 

Next, we'll need to create characters for each of you. We can do this together or you can create them on your own. If you'd like to create them on your own, I recommend using an online character creator like D&D Beyond. 

Once you have your characters, we'll need to decide on a setting and a story for your campaign. Do you have any preferences or ideas for what kind of adventure you'd like to go on? 

Finally, we'll schedule a time to play. Typically, D&D sessions last around 3-4 hours, so make sure you have enough time set aside. 

Let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!",
  "role": "assistant"
}, {'role': 'user', 'content': "Yes we're ready play."}, <OpenAIObject at 0x12027ce00> JSON: {
  "content": "Great! Let's start by creating your characters. Do you have any preferences for what kind of character you'd like to play? For example, a fighter, wizard, rogue, or cleric? 

If you're not sure, I can give you a brief overview of each class and you can choose from there.",
  "role": "assistant"
}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'We have our classes. We have a dwarf cleric, a half-orc cleric, a halfing rogue and a human fighter.'}]
